TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. you become a friend of a absol,but suddenly time and space catch up to absol putting him back into the game.

I wish for the earth to be immortal.

Granted: the earth is now a big space cockroach.

I wish for a tasty bagel.

Granted but as you eat the bagel and cross the road a bird steals it

i wish for moderator abilitys

Granted. With them comes the ability to see all the things moderators keep off the forums and the responsibility to deal with them.

I wish for a new mouse, as good or better than my current one with the failing left-click button.

Granted, its both buttons are functional, but the mouse isn't potty trained and it demands to sleep on your bed.

I wish for a quarter.

You get a quarter of your body.

I wish for communism.

granted. you are convicted of treason to the Soviet Empire and executed

i wish for things

You get broken things

i wish for a better Google translate

Oui? Oui, monsieur?

I wish for the world to just get along!

Granted. Humanity leads a dull, uneventful existence. It searches among the stars for a new home, however as it is already inhabited, and they aren't too friendly, humanity loses, badly.</cynicism>

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹I wish for a good sandwich in front of me. Non-poisoned, please.

Granted, the heavy punches out all of your blood and eats the sandwich.

I wish ancient aliens didn't meddle with humanity's future.

Granted they kill your ancestor

i wish FOR A HELIX FOSSIL

( hail helix)

Granted. It carries a disease that happens to be deadly only to you.

I wish for PHENOMENAL COSMIC POWER!

Granted. You are now challenged by Thanos. [Good luck...]

I wish to get the Neverending Nightmared music out of me head. It makes me so sad, when I'm already so sad with life.

Granted. another song that isnt sad,is the song that never ends gets stuck in your head.

I wish to be a leprechaun.

Granted. People are always trying to steal your lucky charms.

I wish for lucky charms.

Off topic:

I wish for PHENOMENAL COSMIC POWER!

How was the corruption of this one not "Itty-bitty living space"?!

You get crushed by horse shoes

i wish for a G11

Granted. Airsoft.

I wish for the Omnipotent Soda.
Granted you drown

Granted. Uh-WISHUNKNOWN

I wish for time to speed up to may

It does. But your thoughts, and consequently actions, are rendered proportionally slower to the rest of the world. Come May, you are in a hospital bed, having not eaten for over two months, and only being fed through IV's.

I wish for a decent sized asteroid to be found on a course which will impact the Earth, so that it can be studied as it fly's through the atmosphere under observation.

Granted. It is a human shaped asteroid that's going to work, and brought coffee.

I wish to be an eternal rock.

You are now a tiny micro-asteroid floating in deep space without anything nearby for eternity.

I wish for world peace.

Granted. Everyone abolishes their army, followed by a alien invasion.

I wish for a FTL drive

Granted. It breaks down in deep space, leaving you stranded.

I wish I knew what to wish for.
